description:
## Theory
It's the time to add properties to the RDF. For this purpose, a predicate defined in an ontology is used. This predicate is associated to a subject to which it belongs. The predicates that point to a literal are called data property. The predicates that point to a URI are called object property. 

As same as in the last chapter, it is only needed to write the desired output as template using prints to parse the data. For example:
```
<#assign variable=resourceId>
<http://sample.com/resource/[=variable]> a <http://sample.com/class#Class> ;
	<http://sample.com/property#Value> "value" .
```
## Hands-on
### Task
Evolve the mapping from the previous chapter in order to add the data property [foaf:phone](http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/phone) using the column "Phone".
### CSV file content
| ID | Name | Phone | City |
|--|--|--|--|
| 1 | "Lily Dickens" | 585-610-2352 | Oneonta |
| 2 | "Chadd Sporer" | +1-352-334-0992 | Iowa |
| 3 | "Katharina Kuvalis" | (272) 642-0684 | Alberta |
| 4 | "Wilhelmine Johns III" | 574.747.4829 | Bock |
| 5 | "Sofia Rowe" | +15204328362 | Elmhurst |
user_template:
<#assign people=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/mappings-data/ldac/people.csv"})>
<#assign peopleRows = people?trim?split("\n")>
<#list peopleRows as personRow>
<#if !personRow?is_first>
<#assign personColumns = personRow?split(",")>
<#-- Modify the line below and complete the template -->
<http://sample.com/resource/[=personColumns[0]]> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> .

</#if>
</#list>
solution_template:
<#assign people=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/mappings-data/ldac/people.csv"})>
<#assign peopleRows = people?trim?split("\n")>
<#list peopleRows as personRow>
<#if !personRow?is_first>
<#assign personColumns = personRow?split(",")>
<#-- Modify the line below and complete the template -->
<http://sample.com/resource/[=personColumns[0]]> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
	foaf:phone "[=personColumns[2]]" .
</#if>
</#list>
expected_result:
<http://sample.com/resource/1> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
    foaf:phone "585-610-2352" .
<http://sample.com/resource/2> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
    foaf:phone "+1-352-334-0992" .
<http://sample.com/resource/3> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
    foaf:phone "(272) 642-0684" .
<http://sample.com/resource/4> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
    foaf:phone "574.747.4829" .
<http://sample.com/resource/5> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> ;
    foaf:phone "+15204328362" .
